title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketches.  Landscape, "Near Tacunga", Ecuador", June 17, 1857
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at various locations near across center:  green / earth and bushes / greener / white; and at lower left:  Near Tacunga / June 17th / 57-
description: Horizontal view of a valley, with a deeply cut stream bed stretching toward a mountainous background, containing a house in the left middleground and a village or town in the right rear middleground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketches.  Landscape, "Near Tacunga", Ecuador", June 17, 1857.
June 17, 1857. Graphite on brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-240.
